headline.main: Antismoking Drive Is Penetrating A Thick Haze in Japan; Trouble for Government Monopoly Campaign in Subway Stations The Right to Hate Smoke

docs.abstract: Article on antismoking campaign in Japan started by Midori Nakada; illus (M)

byline.original: By HIROTAKA YOSHIZAKI Special to The New York Times

keywords.value: TOBACCO, TOBACCO PRODUCTS AND SMOKERS ARTICLES
keywords.name: subject

docs.lead_paragraph: TOKYO, May 12--An antismoking campaign is catching on in Japan, where the cigarette smoke is thick indeed.

headline.main: Environmentalist Disputes Priorities; Examples of Misplaced Priority U.S. Law Criticized

docs.abstract: Former NYC Environmental Protection Admr Dr Merril Eisenbud says Amer soc has its ecological and health priorities confused; says nation is paying too much attention to trees, scenery and wildlife and not enough to public health; illus (M)

byline.original: By MICHAEL STERNE Special to The New York Times

docs.lead_paragraph: TUXEDO, N.Y.--After four decades of scholarship and research on the troubled relationship between people and their environment, a leading environmental scientist is convinced that American society now has its ecological and health priorities confused.
docs.snippet: TUXEDO, N.Y.--After four decades of scholarship and research on the troubled relationship between people and their environment, a leading environmental scientist is convinced that American society now has its ecological and health priorities...

headline.main: British Products Receive a the Royal Treatment; A Hat for a Fitting Occasion Request Denied

docs.abstract: comment on Brit products that display royal warrants; there are 808 royal warrant holders in GB; illus (L)

byline.original: By SUSAN HELLER ANDERSON Special to The New York Times

docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON--Airwick, bagpipes, milking machines, polo sticks and Hardy Amies don't seem to have much in common. But they all have royal warrants, the impressive coats of arms of the royal family carrying the words, "By appointment to Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth."
